title: The mirrour of maiestie: or, The badges of honour conceitedly emblazoned with emblemes annexed, poetically vnfolded.
author: H. G., fl. 1618.
publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-streete,
notes: Sometimes attributed to Sir Henry Goodyere.
Last leaf contains "A catalogue of those names vnto whom this worke is appropriated".
Variant: [A]2r contains dedication "To the Kings most excellent Maiestie"; [A]2 a cancel?.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
